name: The Wild: Survival Game
description:
The Wild: Survival Game


The Wild is a survival and adventure game where you accidentally arrive on an island where you have to find a way to survive the titans and the strange creatures that appear at night.

What can you do on the island?


Meets the objectives:
Complete the objectives to gain experience and unlock building skills.

Follow the story:
Follow the story of The Wild and face the dangers of the island in order to save yourself and finally get out of the place... if you can.

Customize your character:
Modify his clothes and collect all the clothes, change the color of skin and hair, change and collect the different styles of hairstyles and beards.

Build your shelter:
Build foundations, walls, doors to raise your house and decorate it with furniture such as tables, chairs, wall torches and much more by collecting the resources they need.

Craft Tools and Weapons:
You can Craft useful tools like an ax to cut down trees or a torch to light the way.

Resource Gathering:
With the help of a tool you can collect wood from the trees and thus also obtain their fruits or stones if you need it.

Animals hunt:
Try to build a weapon to hunt animals and get meat to eat or leather to build items. But be careful not to get caught by the wolves.

Search chests:
Look for the different chests that are on the island and get the help you need.
